content:
{"settings":"{
    "debug.console.fontSize": 13,
    "editor.rename.enablePreview": false,
    "editor.cursorBlinking": "smooth",
    "editor.tabCompletion": "on",
    "explorer.confirmDragAndDrop": false,
    "explorer.confirmDelete": false,
    "files.autoSave": "afterDelay",
    "files.associations": {
        "*.eex": "eex",
        "*.leex": "eex",
        "*.env.dev": "env",
        "*.env.prod": "env",
        "*.env.local": "env",
        "*.xml.dist": "xml",
        "*.lock": "json",
        "*.xml.twig": "twig",
        "*.yaml": "yaml"
    },
    "files.watcherExclude": {
        "**/.git/**": true,
        "**/.svn/**": true,
        "**/.hg/**": true,
        "**/CVS/**": true,
        "**/.DS_Store/**": true,
        "**/node_modules/**": true,
        "**/bower_components/**": true,
        "**/deps/**": true,
        "**/.history/**": true
    },
    "workbench.editor.enablePreview": false,
    "search.useReplacePreview": false,
    "json.maxItemsComputed": 10000,
    "emmet.excludeLanguages": [
        "php",
        "markdown",
        "elixir"
    ],
    "git.autofetch": true,
    "terminal.integrated.env.linux": {},
    "remote.SSH.remotePlatform": {
        "medic-dev-epd-p01.sc-int.nines.nl": "linux"
    },
    "editor.fontWeight": "normal",
    "editor.suggestSelection": "first",
    "files.exclude": {
        "**/.classpath": true,
        "**/.project": true,
        "**/.settings": true,
        "**/.factorypath": true
    },
    "terminal.integrated.fontWeight": "normal",
    "editor.renderWhitespace": "all",
    "files.eol": "\n",
    "editor.minimap.enabled": false,
    "explorer.openEditors.sortOrder": "alphabetical",
    "sync.gist": "07e5dba7114bba5300ed507d995a293a",
    "[elixir]": {
        "editor.defaultFormatter": "JakeBecker.elixir-ls"
    },
    "gitlens.codeLens.recentChange.command": "gitlens.showQuickFileHistory",
    "editor.fontFamily": "MesloLGSDZ Nerd Font,Cascadia Mono,Monospace,Hack",
    "redhat.telemetry.enabled": true,
    "json.schemas": [],
    "security.workspace.trust.untrustedFiles": "open",
    "rest-client.fontWeight": "200",
    "twig-language-2.indentStyle": "space",
    "elixirLS.enableTestLenses": true,
    "search.exclude": {
        "**/.history": true
    },
    "local-history.path": "/tmp/.history",
    "editor.lineHeight": 1.2,
    "editor.guides.bracketPairs": true,
    "terminal.integrated.fontSize": 13, //run non-lint commands with bundle exec
    "ruby.useLanguageServer": true, // use the internal language server (see below)
    "ruby.lint": {
        "rubocop": {
            "useBundler": true // enable rubocop via bundler
        },
        "reek": {
            "useBundler": true // enable reek via bundler
        }
    },
    "ruby.format": "rubocop", // use rubocop for formatting,
    "ruby.intellisense": "rubyLocate",
    "ruby.rubocop.executePath": "/usr/local/bin/",
    "terminal.explorerKind": "external",
    "terminal.integrated.defaultProfile.linux": "zsh",
    "editor.defaultFormatter": "JakeBecker.elixir-ls",
    "[json]": {
        "editor.defaultFormatter": "vscode.json-language-features"
    },
    "[dockercompose]": {
        "editor.defaultFormatter": "ms-azuretools.vscode-docker"
    },
    "trunk.trunkGrayOutNonBlockingIssues": false,
    "workbench.colorTheme": "Gloomy Night"
}"}
